burlap.mdp.singleagent.environment.extensions

Class EnvironmentDelegation.Helper

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.mdp.singleagent.environment.extensions.EnvironmentDelegation.Helper
  • Enclosing interface:
    EnvironmentDelegation

    public static class EnvironmentDelegation.Helper
extends Object
    A class that provides tools for working with Environment delegates

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Environment getDelegateImplementing(Environment env, Class<?> type)
      Returns the Environment or Environment delegate that implements the class/interface type, or null if none do.
      static Environment getRootEnvironmentDelegate(EnvironmentDelegation env)
      Returns the root Environment delegate.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getRootEnvironmentDelegate

        public static Environment getRootEnvironmentDelegate(EnvironmentDelegation env)
        Returns the root Environment delegate. Useful if an EnvironmentDelegation is expected to have a delegate that is an EnvironmentDelegation.
        Parameters:
        env - the EnvironmentDelegation to inspect
        Returns:
        the root Environment delegate

      • getDelegateImplementing

        public static Environment getDelegateImplementing(Environment env,
                                                  Class<?> type)
        Returns the Environment or Environment delegate that implements the class/interface type, or null if none do.
        Parameters:
        env - An Environment to inspect
        type - the class/interface type against which and Environment or its delegates are being compared.
        Returns:
        the Environment delegate implementing the input type or null if none do.
